widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (35, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 1), size = (30, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 1), size = (100, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (180, 1), size = (220, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (408, 5), size = (65, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (35, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 1), size = (30, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 1), size = (100, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (180, 1), size = (220, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (408, 5), size = (65, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 25 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100,11), size = (360,20), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (30,6), size = (45,30), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20)], "itemHeight": 45 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex,50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
